BackBroomstick.name: Broom Stick Infraspinatus Stretch
BackBroomstick.preparation: Grasp pole at one end and position overhead with other end of pole behind opposite arm. Grasp other end of pole with hand positioned below elbow. Position elbow at height of shoulder.
BackBroomstick.execution: Pull upper end of pole forward so shoulder is internally rotated. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.

BackBentover.name: Bent-over Infraspinatus Stretch
BackBentover.preparation: Place both hands on waist with thumbs facing forward. Bend over so torso is parallel to floor.
BackBentover.execution: Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch .

BackSeatedBentover.name: Seated Bent-over Infraspinatus Stretch
BackSeatedBentover.preparation: Sit on bench or chair. Place both hands on waist with thumbs facing forward. Lean over and rest torso on thighs.
BackSeatedBentover.execution: Allow elbows to fall downward toward floor. Hold stretch.

BackSideLying.name: Side Lying Infraspinatus Stretch
BackSideLying.preparation: Lie supine on mat or floor with knees bent approximately 90 degrees. Position hand under side of waist, palm down.
BackSideLying.execution: Allow legs and hips to fall to side of positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
BackSideLying.comments: Lean torso toward positioned arm if stretch is not yet felt.

BackSideLyingTeresMinor.name: Side Lying Teres Minor Stretch
BackSideLyingTeresMinor.preparation: Lie down on side on mat or floor. Position arm on floor with bent elbow positioned forward on mat and hand above elbow. With other hand, grasp back of wrist.
BackSideLyingTeresMinor.execution: Keeping elbow bend at a right angle, push forearm downward toward floor. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite side.
